name: Slay or Fall
storyline: As a dark lord, you have to take over the reins of a huge dungeon, while brave heroes are coming for your soul!
summary: The player takes on the burden of a dark dungeon lord. However, a squad of heroes has come to his lands and intend to defeat the player. The task of the dark lord: to kill, expel, break the heroes before they reach him. Throughout the game, the lord is in his throne room and influences events indirectly. However, it is through such undermining decisions that the heroes must be overcome. In addition, the political situation in the dungeon lands is extremely unstable. Of the 4 nations, only one favors the player, the rest have to be taken into account and solve pressing political problems.
